title: OPEN 7 DAYS A WEEK FOR YOUR NEEDS--INCLUDING YOUR A/C!!!
posting_body: Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.
Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!

Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher-Ceiling fans in living areas and bedrooms-Wood-style plank flooring                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Oversized closets-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-Mountain views-Separate dining area-Polished kitchen countertops

Professional onsite management-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-State-of-the-art fitness center                                                                                         Featured amenity-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:

Only a small one-time payment-Barbecue pavilion and picnic area-Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball-Fenced dog park with pet watering station                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance-Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating and firepit
